column4: Can I play computer games on ubuntu ? such as Football games ,or some big games
You can play lots of simple games which come with Ubuntu, download extra ones from the repositories, emulate pretty much anythinkg and virtualise Windows games
Sorry, didn't get last word
OK!he can't do anything with it ,for there is no power.
I dont know why
Could you help me ?
No power? As in electricity? Does it require an external plug?
No ,he cant do with it any more because he has not any permission to do antthing
If he uses Linux then sudo will give super user permission (careful when using it). If you know basic terminal commands then you can access files from usb easily
After I have moved the files he wanted to his ubuntu ,he couldnt do with it ,no permission.
You will want to know: cd /place/where/USBDrive/is (will go to the drive) ls (will list what's there) cp filename /where/you/want/it (will copy file "filename" to "/where/you/want/it")
Use sudo "chown hisusername thefilesyouwanttoaccess"
add a "-R" if it includes directories
OK! I am trying..thank you
on his computer or on mine whe I use that command ?
On his computer, so it sets the permissions to his username on his machine
I think GAIM is fine
the question is should others install any programme to chat with me ?
GAIM uses Jabber which was improved by Google. It doesn't use voice chat, but text is compatible with anyone else using GAIM or other Jabber client on any other platform
I see! you mean that I can use Gaim to chat with others who are in my Gmail ,or ues google talk as well ,right?
I think Google recommend GAIM on Linux (sorry, been away)
OK! but how to use it
Just open it up and you will be asked to put in some details. Choose Jabber for protocol, etc.
